title: Strengthening and Promoting Innovation in the Nation's Cybersecurity
summary: President Biden has issued an executive order to strengthen and promote innovation in the nation's cybersecurity. The order focuses on defending digital infrastructure, securing vital services, and addressing threats from countries like China. It also emphasizes the importance of accountability for software providers, strengthening federal communications and identity management systems, and promoting the use of emerging technologies for cybersecurity. The order includes provisions for operationalizing transparency and security in third-party software supply chains, improving the cybersecurity of federal systems, promoting security in AI, aligning policy to practice, combating cybercrime and fraud, protecting national security systems, and defining key terms.
